text:
[Verse]
Sky is burning red
Dreams come alive
Whispers in the air
Colors start to dive

[Verse 2]
Night begins to climb
Stars begin to shine
Moonlight fills the sky
Sunset bids goodbye

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams fade away
Bright lights come to play
Chasing night into the dawn
Dance until the light is gone

[Verse 3]
Echoes of the day
Dance upon the waves
Moments we will save
In the twilight haze

[Bridge]
Heartbeats in sync
Moonlight on the brink
Never let it sink
In the night we wink

[Verse 4]
Footsteps on the sand
Your hand in my hand
Magic in the land
Like we always planned
title: Sunset Dreams
